content: A Stander Super Pole is a type of mobility aid designed to provide support and assistance for individuals with limited mobility or balance issues. It consists of a vertical pole that can be installed in various locations in the home, such as next to a bed or chair, and provides a stable handhold for standing up or sitting down. The Super Pole is adjustable in height and can be customized to fit individual needs and preferences. It can also be used in conjunction with other Stander products, such as the SuperBar or Tension Mount Transfer Pole, to create a complete mobility system that provides added support and safety. The Stander Super Pole is designed to be easy to install and does not require any structural changes to the home. It is a popular choice among seniors, people with disabilities, and anyone who needs additional assistance with mobility and balance.
